actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to require, when the construction or leasing of Government buildings or space is proposed for metropolitan buildings or space is proposed for Metropolitan Washington D.C. that alternative proposals be submitted for municipalities of less than 75,000 population in other parts of the country.

summary.text: Requires, under the Public Buildings Act of 1959, that when the construction or leasing of Government buildings or space is proposed for metropolitan Washington, District of Columbia, that alternative proposals be submitted for municipalities of less than seventy-five thousand population in other parts of the country. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 606)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to require, when the construction or leasing of Government buildings or space is proposed for metropolitan buildings or space is proposed for Metropolitan Washington D.C. that alternative proposals be submitted for municipalities of less than 75,000 population in other parts of the country.
